5.title: Player Motivations
5.content: ğŸ¤ Cooperation . Players will have lots of ways to cooperate directly with other players and are highly motivated to seek each other out and team up. ğŸ† Competition . Teams will have metrics and achievements based on personal performance of individuals within their team. ğŸ”¥ Destruction . Players will be able to cause destruction to the environment and enemies in an over-the-top fireworks-display comical manner. ğŸ’ª Progression . Players will feel stronger in a single session during gameplay and upgrade their characters during the meta gameplay. ğŸ” Discovery . Players will be able to discover different environments, characters, and enemies over their sessions.

18.title: Overview
18.content: Dungeon Survivors* is a bullet-heaven dungeon crawling multiplayer game where hundreds of players group together to survive for as long as possible against incresingly difficult waves of whimsical fantasy monsters. * Working title . The game is currently under development and Universe Builders are seeking funding to be able to complete Pre-Production. ğŸ¨ Art Style . 2.5D, fixed camera, isometric, fantasy, voxels . ğŸ› ï¸ Mechanics . | Combat | Telegraphed attacks | Roles (Tank, Healer, DPS, Crowd Control, â€¦) | . ğŸ•¹ï¸ Player Motivations . Cooperation, Competition, Destruction, Progression, Discovery . ğŸ’ª Player Fantasies . | Playing an impactful role in a group | Playing with large groups (100+) to overcome challenges | Playing with popular streamers | . âŒ› Session Length . 15 minutes . ğŸ‘ª Target Market . ğŸ“º Target Platforms . | Web (Chrome, Edge, Safari, Firefox, â€¦) | Mobile (Android, iPhone) | MacOSX | Windows 10, 11 | Linux | . ğŸ“º Controls . âŒ¨ï¸ Â  WASD or Arrows ğŸ® Â  Joystick ğŸ“± Â  One touch controls . ğŸ“‡ Tags . MMO, Multiplayer, Cooperative, Touch screen support, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, RPG, Achievements. ğŸ’­ Gameplay Inspirations . | Vampire Survivors | Soulstone Survivors | World of Warcraft - Raids | .

20.title: Home
20.content: Universe Builders is a game development studio located in Melbourne Australia focusing on the development of highly accessibile massively multiplayer games for the Web, Mobile, Windows, Linux, and PC.
